entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:49 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -3.3°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -3.3°C

Visibility: 16.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
